nodes.text: Dynba Tesc was a Human female native to Garqi.

When she began opposing the Galactic Empire shortly after the Battle of Endor, Corran Horn helped her escape offworld where she met a Rebel Captain named Dromath, an officer in the New Republic Defense Force. The pair eventually married and had a son, Rade Dromath. Her husband was killed in the Thrawn campaign and she later moved back to Garqi.

Paranoid about an invasion from the Imperial Remnant, she had escape plans and stockpiles stored up. However, it all came to nothing when she was killed in the Yuuzhan Vong invasion of Garqi in 25 ABY. However, the supplies were used to great effect by her young son Rade.
